(poor-amphibian [pooramphibian], slash-resistant [slashres], blunt-resistant [bluntres], pierce-resistant [pierceres], magic-being [magicbeing], inanimate [inanimate], trample [trample], need-not-eat [neednoteat], mindless [mind], does-not-heal-naturally [noheal], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 misc
#nametype [nametype]: 107

summoned with #1137 Forge Brass Bull (Construction 7)

The Khalkotauroi are huge automatas in the image of fire breathing brass bulls. They are almost impervious to damage and will strike enemies too large to trample with their enchanted hooves and horns.
